metadata.comment: Date on which data was collected by The COVID Tracking Project
The two letter code of a United States state or territory
Total fatalities with confirmed OR probable COVID-19 case diagnosis
Total fatalities with confirmed COVID-19 case diagnosis
Daily difference in death
Total fatalities with probable COVID-19 case diagnosis
The total number of individuals that have been hospitalised thus far with COVID-19
Individuals currently hospitalised with COVID-19
Daily difference
The total number of COVID-19 infected individuals that have been hospitalized in an Intensive Care Unit thus far
The number of COVID-19 infected individuals currently in an Intensive Care Unit
Individuals with a completed viral test that returned a negative result
Completed viral tests that returned negative results
Individuals with confirmed or probable COVID-19
Increase in positive computed by subtracting the value of positive from the previous day from the value of positive for the current day
Individuals with a completed viral test that returned a positive result
Completed viral tests that returned positive results
Currently computed by adding positive and negative values to work around reporting lags between positives and total tests and because some states do not report totals
Daily Difference in totalTestResults
Completed viral tests
Individuals that have recovered from COVID-19.  The definition of recovered varies by state, territory.
Thus far, the total number of COVID-19 infected individuals that have been assisted by a ventilator whilst hospitalised.
The number of COVID-19 infected individuals currently hospitalised under advanced ventilation
The number of pending test results.
The COVID Tracking Project grade of the completeness of the data reporting by a state.
Federal Information Processing Standard state code.
The date and time, Eastern Time, the state or territory last updated the data
